name: cozy up cowl
notes:
materials
- 2 balls of purl soho’s [pouf][1], 50% alpaca and 50% andean highland wool. each ball of this super bulky-weight yarn is approximately 108 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 175 yards required. we used the colors crocus bud, golden green, and high tide.
- us 11 (8 mm), 16-inch [circular knitting needles][2]
- a [stitch marker][3]
- a us 13 (9 mm) or us 15 (10 mm) [knitting needle][4], any type, for binding off

gauge
11 stitches and 15 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch

size
- finished circumference at bottom: 22½ inches
- finished circumference at top: 19½ inches
- finished height: 21 inches

designed by purl soho designer, [hiromi glover][5]. see even more of hiromi’s work [on her instagram][6]!


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/pouf.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-circular_needles.html
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-stitch_markers.html
  [4]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-circular_needles-double_pointed_needles-straight_needles.html
  [5]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/
  [6]: https://www.instagram.com/mignonnegrise/
